result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel A Strelecki was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
First 10 days Straight Time (Jail), Remaining Huber with standard release conditions.
Credit For Time Served 0 Days.

miscConds.notes:
Cost and Surcharge to be paid as a Condition of Probation at the rate of $100.00 per month starting 01-02-2015.  Failure to pay the Court orders 4 days Huber as Contempt for non-compliance with Court Order.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

Follow through with current treatment.
Follow through with any recommendations of Agent.
Operate a Motor Vehicle with a valid driver's license.
No violent contact with anyone in the family.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Daniel A Strelecki in court with attorney Anna M Kees.  Timothy F. Westphal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.

The Court Orders the Following:

Imposed and Stayed Sentence of:
60 Days  Jail  First 10 days STRAIGHT TIME Remaining Huber (Credit - 0 days) HUBER WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS.

Term of Probation: 1 Year

Conditions of Probation:
- Follow through with current treatment;
- Follow through with any recommendations of agent;
- Operate a Motor Vehicle with a Valid Drivers License;
- Maintain/Obtain full time employment;
- No violant contact with anyone in the family.

Costs: $243.00 
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00
(To be paid as a condition of probation at the rate of $100.00  per month commencing 1-2-15 Failure to pay  the Court orders 4 days Huber as contempt for non-compliance with Court Order).
